name: Magic Tiles Friends Saga
description:
Magic Tiles Friends Saga is for the master pianist inside you! We have over a hundred songs you will love from various genres from Twinkle Twinkle Little Star to You Are My Sunshine, all specially curated to give your child the best musical experience!

Magic Tiles Friends Saga is the newest piano game that combines magic piano tiles with cute characters, fun new game modes and new exciting saga map.

Let’s tap the tiles, play the game on your mobile, meet your friends.

Game’s rules:

Magic Tiles Friends Saga is easy to play. The goal of the game is simple
- Tap on the carrots featured on the screen to feed the rabbits below
- Avoid tapping anywhere else and enjoy our game!

Game features:
- Unique magic saga where you can explore the journey, play piano and create your own magic
- ALL NEW CHALLENGES TO TRY! Experience 100 over levels of non-stop fun and entertainment!
- Many adorable characters that accompany in your journey. Get access to various animals including mouse, chicken, bear, dog and many more!

So, get ready and try out the fantastic piano games for free! The attractive piano online which is more challenging than you could imagine.

Become a real pianist now! And catch up the trend with this new magic piano game 2019!
